content.text:
# Filmfare Award for Best Art Director â€“ South

The Filmfare Best Production design Award is given by the Filmfare magazine as part of its annual Filmfare Awards for South Indian films.
The award was first given in 1998. Here is a list of the award winners and the films for which they won.
